name: Zen Garden
description: Unashamedly postcardish wide angle picture of the garden in front of the Hojo (方丈前庭) in Kennin-ji (建仁寺), the world's oldest extant Zen Buddhist temple, built 810 years ago and located in Kyoto, Japan. Photo taken 06 June 2013 during a trip sponsored by Canon Inc. (キヤノン). Coordinates: 35.000923, 135.773727. Originally released on 17 May 2021 as HeN OBJKT 85537.
